contest-event.event-date:
May 24, 1904 D Chepstow Contest
Chepstow Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
chepstow-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
H.M.S. Pinafore
Castle Grounds, Chepstow, Monmouthshire Prizes £15, £10, £5 March contest: 1. Prince's End, 2. Bristol, 3. Drybrook The march contest was one of sight reading - the bands not having seen the piece before - "Chepstow Castle" was specially written by Ord Hume for the contest. Non-playing bands were kept as far away on the grounds as possible so not to be able to hear their competitors. 4 bands competed
Aug. 25, 2013, 11:17 p.m. Aug. 29, 2018, 9:27 a.m.
1 Bristol Imperial J. E. Wilkinson
2 Prince's End Temperance C. Smith
3 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band William Holdsworth
4 Bilston Band Herbert Fisher
